description:
Since Yami always wears the same clothing, Risa and Mio take her shopping. However, her new and improved wardrobe prevents her from using her weapons properly. Haruna thinks she may have a stalker. Nana and Momo go to extremes to avoid studying the Royal Lineage of Deviluke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ombrichette à la mode / Wonderful Love / Twins Escape
Yami Yami Fashion / Wonderful Love / Twins Escape
